name: Celebrity Name Game
description:
Play along with the free Celebrity Name Game Board Game App to enhance your board game experience at home.

Get the countdown sound effects from the hit show to experience the game just like your favourite celebrities.

Celebrity Name Game Board Game App features:
45 second countdown timer
75 second countdown timer
Show Sound Effects & Host Intro

Sharpen your skills by watching Celebrity Name Game, weeknights at 6.00pm on Channel 10.


FremantleMedia Australia Pty Ltd
